mean_en: someone who has left school usually after completing a course of study instead of continuing on to a college or university
word_etyma: school学校+-leav=leave离开+er名词后缀 → 中途辍学者
short_phrase: School-leavers ready to receive their diplomas.
sentence: In the UK, most school-leavers will go on to attend university.
sentence_trans: 在英国，大多数的学校毕业生会继续念大学。
